sentence.Network_en: He sat back, smiling complacently at his own cleverness.
sentence.Network_cn: 他身子往后一靠，为自己的聪明得意地笑了。

sentence.Network_en: He complacently lived out his life as a village school teacher.
sentence.Network_cn: 他满足于一个乡村教师的生活.

sentence.Network_en: " That was just something for evening wear , " returned his wife complacently.
sentence.Network_cn: “ 那套衣服是晚装, " 他妻子心安理得地说道.

list.abs: the manager and everyone at Chelsea works really hard at not becoming complacent .主教练和队里的每个人都在辛勤工作，没有人自满。
We can ' t grow complacent ., 我们不可固步自封.
The power is strong enough to shatter complacency ., 这种力量很强大 , 足以打破自满情绪.
We should always against complacency ., 我们应随时警惕自满情绪.
Try to be modest and prudent , against complacency ., 要谦虚谨慎 , 防止自满情绪.

entry.tran: 自满的;沾沾自喜的;满不在乎的
entry.def: A complacent person is very pleased with themselves or feels that they do not need to do anything about a situation, even though the situation may be uncertain or dangerous.

example.ex: We cannot afford to be complacent about our health.
example.tran: 对于健康我们决不能掉以轻心。

example.ex: ...the Chancellor's complacent attitude towards the far-right's activities.
example.tran: 总理对极右分子活动表现出的不以为意

sentences.sentence: "he complacently lived out his life as a village school teacher"

auth_sentence.content: Halliday watched complacently as his new idea sank in.
auth_sentence.res_content: Halliday watched complacently as his new idea sank in.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Halliday watched complacently as his new idea sank in.

auth_sentence.content: The EU authorities, having complacently allowed borrowing to rise in the boom years, now insist on severe austerity in Greece.
auth_sentence.res_content: The EU authorities, having complacently allowed borrowing to rise in the boom years, now insist on severe austerity in Greece.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The EU authorities, having complacently allowed borrowing to rise in the boom years, now insist on severe austerity in Greece.

auth_sentence.content: Every time we turn a corner, there is Mill, smiling just a touch too complacently at having got there first.
